title: Rek'Sai Tunnel Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: During a game last night in twisted treeline on the oceanic servers I ended up vsing a Rek'Sai and one of his tunnels ended up 'being destroyed' however, the tunnel stayed there, never timed out afterwards and couldn't be 'destroyed' again. The main problem was that Rek'Sai could still go through the tunnel as many times as he wanted without cooldown and use his ultimate to transport himself to it. I do not have any screenshots or video evidence atm and haven't been able to recreate the bug.

replies.body:
_"I do not have any screenshots or video evidence atm and haven't been able to recreate the bug."_

No one can really help you then. Try using [this](http://www.replay.gg/) site, to recover the replay footage (it's down ATM though).

Also bug posts now go on [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) forum. Any gameplay bug reports here will likely be ignored.
